Package it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.strategies.speed

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantSpeed<T>
    This strategy makes the node move at an average constant speed, which is influenced by the TimeDistribution of the IReaction hosting this IAction.
    InteractWithOthers<T>
    This strategy slows down nodes depending on how many "interacting" nodes are found in the surroundings.
    RoutingTraceDependantSpeed<T>
    This TraceDependantSpeed strategy computes the remaining distance by relying on maps data for a selected Vehicle.
    StraightLineTraceDependantSpeed<T>
    This TraceDependantSpeed uses the distance between coordinates for estimating the distance.
    TraceDependantSpeed<T>
    This strategy dynamically tries to move the node adjusting its speed to synchronize the reaction rate and the traces data.
